title: Regenerate Candid declarations for clearBoardroom method

requirements.text: Regenerate the backend Candid interface declarations (.did file) to include the clearBoardroom method that was added to backend/main.mo

quotes: Run the necessary internal workspace commands to regenerate the backend Candid declarations

acceptanceCriteria: The .did file in the backend workspace contains the clearBoardroom method signature
The generated declarations match the current main.mo actor interface

requirements.text: Synchronize the frontend Candid declarations (.did.js and .did.d.ts files) so that the React app can recognize and call the clearBoardroom method without 'Actor missing' errors

quotes: Ensure the generated .did and .did.js/.did.d.ts files in the frontend workspace are fully synced so the React app recognizes clearBoardroom

acceptanceCriteria: The frontend .did.js file includes the clearBoardroom method
The frontend .did.d.ts TypeScript declarations include the clearBoardroom method signature
The useClearBoardroom hook can successfully call the backend method without type errors

constraints: Do NOT modify ANY frontend React files (.tsx, .ts)
nonGoals: Adding new functionality to the backend
